item.title: Releasing Fretboard ğŸ¸
item.description: Fretboard is a weekend project to display guitar and ukulele chords using SwiftUI. Features: ğŸµ Chord positions ğŸŒ— Light / Dark modes ğŸ¸ Guitar & ukulele chords with basic tunings â³ More to come. Installation Swift Package Manager Add https://github.com/itsmeichigo/Fretboard.git as the source and you’re good to go. Manual install Copy contents from Sources folder to your project. Usage Get your desired instruments: let guitar = Instrument.guitar let ukulele = Instrument.
